data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
The Text/HTML Module renders plain text, rich text or HTML. Five different editing views are available:

  1. Basic Text Box / Text: Renders basic text and HTML tags. Text entered on a new line is rendered as a line break. The text style is the Normal style, as set in your style sheet.
  2. Basic Text Box / HTML: Displays basic text in HTML format.
  3. Basic Text Box / Raw: Displays basic text in HTML format. Text entered on a new line is not rendered as a line break.
  4. Rich Text Editor / HTML: Allows you to paste HTML from other sources.
  5. Rich Text Editor / Design: A full word processor or WYSIWYG (What You See is What You Get) editor with functionality such as hyperlinks, email links, File Manager image gallery, bullet points, spell check and more.

In addition the module also supports version management and workflow. In Community Edition two modes of workflow are available - Direct Publish and Content Staging.

data.name: AddContentFromToolBar.Text
data.value: Выберите команду "Редактировать" в меню действий модуля.

data.name: AddContentFromActionMenu.Text
data.value: Чтобы изменить содержимое модуля, включите режим редактирования на панели инструментов. Затем можно использовать меню или кнопки действий модуля для управления содержимым
